Title: Knowledge of Giants II
Text:
One of the Giants, a creature of ancient days, was seen in the valley of the giants south of the High Moor, high above the Bruinen. Barachen reportedly saw the creature standing next to some mighty trees as he came south into the valley.

Barachen reported seeing one of the Onodrim somewhere in the Trollshaws, and Elladan thinks it possible that this creature might know something of the missing Nazg√ªl's whereabouts.
CompleteText:
The Giant attacked you? The tree-herders of old were peaceful and more wont to stand unnoticed among the trees than treat with strangers, with peace or violence.
I do not know the meaning of these signs, @p. Our problems may be more far-reaching than I had supposed.
